tool.name: Generate genotype population info
tool.command: #set header = 'header.txt' #set samples = 'samples.txt' grep "#CHROM" $input_vcf > $header && tr '\t' '\n' < $header > $samples && sed -i 1,9d $samples && awk -F'\t' -v OFS='\t' 'NR==0 {print ; next}{print (NR),$0}' $samples > $output
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates a file that contains the genotype population information that can be used as input to the multilocus_genotype tool. This tool can be used only within a Galaxy instance which includes the complementary stag database.
